pages.text:
Call Us
About FOO BAR
Melbourne's Most Attractive Bar
Bear Deardoff recently relaunched Foo Bar in downtown Melbourne.
Foo Bar provides quality service with an outstanding variety of the finest spirits, beer, and wine, served in a family-friendly environment.
Foo Bar is a special place to enjoy great atmosphere that accommodates the most demanding tastes. An upscale yet low key place for locals to gather.
Deardoff wants to bring that high-end atmosphere back. “I want Foo Bar to be a firm staple in the community,” he said. “I want it to be roots for people. I want for people to know they have a cool place to go.”
Our decor
Rustic Style
“The entrance, with its sculptures and landscaping, is proof enough you aren’t in dive-land any more. You can sit in the darker enclaves of the porch, but most choose the inside, which is better lit and never so dark you can’t see who might be approaching. It makes for good people-watching.”  –
FLORIDA TODAY
Foo Bar is a cocktail lounge,  not a club. It’s a place to have drinks before going out to dinner at a nearby restaurant or before seeing a play. Tucked into an alley just east of Meg O’Malley’s, it has an intimate, exotic air, with retro murals on the walls of an outdoor courtyard and dark wood and tin ceilings inside.
Eventually Owner, Bear Deardoff wants to host events again, maybe raise money for animal welfare charities. For now, though, he’s happy to be back in downtown Melbourne and part of the community.
“People want to see the business succeed,” he said. “They want to see Foo Bar come back.”
Foo Bar
is at 816 New Haven Ave. Melbourne, 321-802-5006,

Call Us
Foo Bar's Nightly Events
Doors Open At 4pm Mon – Saturday And 3pm On Sunday
Reggae On A Sunday
Every 1st Sunday of the month
Music by Dexter Lab:  6 PM – 12 AM
$5 Corona & Heineken – $10 Hennessy
$8 (2) Guiness Stout
Service Industry Night
Every Monday Night
Ladies Night
Every Wednesday Night
Throwback Thursday
Every Thursday Night
Happy Hour Sundays
There’s nothing like unwinding with a cold drink on a Sunday. Which is why
Foo Bar
offers
Happy Hour 3pm till closing on Sundays.
During Happy Hour, you can enjoy discounted prices on all of your favorite drinks. If you’re looking for something to sip on while you catch up with friends, try the specialty cocktail of the day. There are also discounted prices on beer and wine. So whether you’re looking to relax or let loose,
Foo Bar
is the perfect place to do it.
